es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica5.bgame.control

Class VisualController

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.control.Controller
      • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica5.bgame.control.VisualController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, MoveGenerator.MoveListener, GameWindow.GameChangesListener

    public class VisualController
extends Controller
implements MoveGenerator.MoveListener, GameObserver, GameWindow.GameChangesListener
    This controller manages a game which is played with a GUI. Each controller manages a single window.
    Author:
    ï¿½lvaro & Jorge

                        java.util.List<Piece> pieces,
                        Piece owner)
        Constructs a new controller.
        Parameters:
        game - the game which this controller will manage.
        pieces - the players in the game
        owner - the player to which the associated window will belong. null if this controller manages multiple players.

      • onGameStart

        public void onGameStart(Board board,
                        java.lang.String gameDesc,
                        java.util.List<Piece> pieces,
                        Piece turn)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a game has started.

        Notifica que se ha iniciado un juego.

        Specified by:
        onGameStart in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        gameDesc - A string describing the currently played game.

        Un string que describe el juego al que se esta jugando.

        pieces - A list of pieces that are used to play the game (each piece belongs to a player).

        Lista de fichas que se utilizan para jugar a este juego (cada ficha pertenece a un jugador).

        turn - The piece to be played next.

        Ficha a la que corresponde mover.

      • onGameOver

        public void onGameOver(Board board,
                       Game.State state,
                       Piece winner)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a game has finished (with a winner, draw, or stopped).

        Notifica que ha terminado un juego (con un ganador, en tablas, o se ha interrumpido).

        Specified by:
        onGameOver in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        state - The state in which the game has finished.

        Estado en el que ha quedado el tablero.

        winner - The piece of the winner, if the game has finished with a winner, otherwise null.

        Ficha del ganador si el juego ha terminado con un ganador, o null en caso contrario.

        Description copied from interface: GameObserver

        Specified by:
        onMoveEnd in interface GameObserver

      • addGameWindowForPieces

        public void addGameWindowForPieces(BoardJPanel boardPanel,
                                   Player randomPlayer,
                                   Player aiPlayer,
                                   Piece viewPiece)
        Creates a new game window with the provided board panel, players and piece.
        Parameters:
        boardPanel - the panel which presents the board.
        randomPlayer - the player to generate random moves.
        aiPlayer - the player to generate AI moves.
        the - player to which the associated window will belong. null if this controller manages multiple players.
